Title: A Breath of Fresh Air
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Michael Dante DiMartino (created by), Tim Hedrick, Bryan Konietzko (created by)
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, P.J. Byrne, J.K. Simmons
Plot: As Korra tries to restore the streets of Republic city, she learns that her decision to keep the spirit portals open has created a new conflict between humans and spirits, and triggered the emerging of new Airbenders.
